item.title: South Korean Unrest Conspiracy Theories Are Spread by Social Media
item.description: Right-wing YouTube​rs helped President Yoon Suk Yeol​ win his election. They are now his allies in the wake of his botched imposition of martial law.

item.title: How the Islamic State Radicalizes People Today
item.description: A man who pledged allegiance to the terrorist group carried out a deadly attack in New Orleans on New Year’s Day.
